limitles; iPhone cases and accesories

Our cases blend technology with lifestyle, they are super protective while being crafted from real, high quality materials.

love slim cases, hate broken screens?

lined with Airoshock; a smart material engineered to offer ultimate protection. Limitless cases are engineered to be super slim and offer maximum protection, so you can drop them over and over...

magnetic accessories

our limitless range was deigned so everything looks and works seamlessly altogether. all out cases have a steel plate in the back so they work with all our magnetic accessories.

your screen is protected

our cases will protect your phone even if you drop it face down. how? every case has a raised front lip to help prevent the screen from hitting the ground. we also give a FREE high quality screen protector with every case for extra protection.

these cases are protective but still incredible thin! limitless cases only add ~2mm to the thickness of your iPhone it also adds just 42 grams.
